hgraphr — hgraphr
text: plot showing high dimensional attributes indication percentile ranges.

title: hgraphr — hgraphr
text: df data frame containing values plotted. Data frame must contain: dimension, measure, individual, neighborhood. Dimension factor, measure numeric, individual neighborhood logical. color_palette vector RGB background colors used percentile ranges (0, 0.5), (0.5, 0.8), (0.8, 0.9), (0.9, 0.95), (0.95, 1.0)

title: hgraphr — hgraphr
code: df = data.frame( dimension = factor(state.name[1:18]), measure = runif(18), individual = sample(c(TRUE, FALSE, FALSE), 18, replace = TRUE), neighborhood = sample(c(TRUE, TRUE, FALSE), 18, replace = TRUE) ) %>%   dplyr::mutate(measure = ifelse(individual == FALSE &                                    neighborhood == FALSE, NA, measure)) hgraphr(df) #> Warning: Removed 11 rows containing missing values (geom_point). #> Warning: Removed 9 rows containing missing values (geom_point).
